title: OrexBit

content: Investment Plans: 8% daily for 15 Days (Principal Included) ; 4% daily for 30 Days, 6% daily for 60 Days, 8% daily for 90 Days (Principal Return)Join now : www.orexbit.comOrexBit engages in cryptocurrency trading & mining and distributing profits to investors.Whether they're a startup with big dreams or a household name, we're here to help the crypto sector grow and thrive financially. In the grand scheme of things, private enterprise's foray into space literally happened yesterday.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: QuinielaPosible on February 27, 2023, 03:00:56 AM8% Daily?Â  This is a common ponzi scheme, read more here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434116.0 Similar ponzi schemes may offer a higher percentage of profitability, but it should be understood that this money is paid to early investors at the expense of those who later joined the project. By the way, the scam site is no longer working.
